#### Wood Furniture & Cabinet Coating {#coat-indcom-wood_furniture}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-wood_furniture-setup}
WOOD_FURNITURE_CATEGORIES <- c(
  "#256 Wood Furniture Ctg." = 256,
  "#257 Wood Furniture C/U" = 257, # "C/U" means "cleanup solvent"
  "#1914 Wood Furniture Ctg. (Area)" = 1914,
  "#1915 Wood Furniture C/U (Area)" = 1915)
```

##### History {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-wood_furniture-annual_emissions-chart}
BY2011_annual_emission_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    WOOD_FURNITURE_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_emissions_by(
    fill = category) 
```

##### Emission Factors (Area) {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-wood_furniture-annual_emission_factor-chart}
BY2011_annual_area_source_emission_factor_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    WOOD_FURNITURE_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_emission_factors_by(
    color = category)
```

##### Growth {-}

